div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PaymentReconciliation|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `PaymentReconciliation.type` has a context of PaymentReconciliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
